speech:
Hi students, here are what I can do:
- I can check your attendance by greeting me
- I can give important links (material links, zoom link, score dashboard,...) 
- I can cheers you up when you are sad :((
- I can tell you jokes to make you smile :))
- I can clear up my own messages 
- I can show who is missing or not yet check their attendance
- I can answer common questions about CoderSchool (opening hours, who is CEO, best instructor, TA,...)
- I can do small talks to you :))
- I can introduce a bit about myself
- I can choose what kind of food you should have for lunch or dinner 
- I can give points to you (Can only be done by TAs/Instructors). 
Format: `give {point} {activity} {notes (optional)} {mentions}`. 
Activity can be [quiz|project|attendance|activities|others]
Example: @bu give 2 activities finishing homework @abc @def
